Headline: #85 Central Temporary Southbound Reroute near Central/Lake
ShortDescription: Southbound 85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via: Central, Lake, Austin, Washington and Central due to, street blockage near Central/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via: Central, Lake, Austin, Washington and Central due to, street blockage near Central/Lake.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Harlem and Ashland/Lake
ShortDescription: Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Harlem and Ashland/Lake due to fire department activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Harlem and Ashland due to fire department activity.

As a result, trains are operating only between 63rd/Ashland/63rd Cottage Grove and Ashland/Lake at this time.

Shuttle buses have been requested from Harlem and Ashland/Lake to provide connecting service through the affected area.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
